content.p: Associate Professor, Module Convener / Teaching: Communications & Networks Teaching: Academic & Professional Skills for Foundation Fundamentals of Computing Management Information System (E-Commerce, Knowledge Management, Educational Technology) Decision Support System (knowledge Management) Information Retrieval(data Mining) E-Commerce (web commerce, e-commerce and social commerce on security, privacy and trust) telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8000 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8018
